name: Xenoids
description:
You wake up from a cryo sleep aboard the Ark 5 spacecraft and discover that the entire team has disappeared and creepy monsters are walking along the gloomy corridors. The situation is aggravated by the fact that the ship will soon collide with an asteroid. Can you survive and prevent a catastrophe?

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of sci-fi horror. Explore the cold and dark decks of the space ark where death may be waiting around every corner.


Features:
⚫ Two game modes: Story and survival.
⚫ Several characters to choose from with their own characteristics.
⚫ Random generation of levels. A new experience with each new game.
⚫ The ship's dynamic infection system.
⚫ Collect resources and create useful items and weapons.
⚫ Survive with your friends in cooperative mode.
